TEXT: The applicant is an NORP limited company , having its registered office in GPE ( GPE ) .
It is represented before the ORG by PERSON PERSON , a lawyer practising in PERSON ( GPE ) .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE , the applicant company , acting as a creditor of limited company C. , requested ORG to declare the latter insolvent and wind it up .
On an unspecified date , the investigating judge scheduled the first hearing for DATE .
In a judgment of DATE , ORG declared the limited company C. insolvent .

According to LAW No . CARDINAL of DATE ( hereinafter referred to as the " legge fallimentare " ) , the receiver appointed by ORG may , subject to proof that the other party was aware that the debtor was insolvent , obtain the revocation of every payment of a debt and of every alienation of assets carried out by the debtor in DATE which precedes the formal declaration of insolvency , by means of the so - called " azione revocatoria fallimentare " .
